author: Richard Godwin
description: A charcoal-filtered light rum works best as more full-bodied rums simply don't sit well with the cardamon. Hit the right balance with the right rum and this delicately cardamon-influenced daiquiri is delicious.
name: Cardamom Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut zest from your lime for garnish prior to squeezing for juice
MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
